title: Diary of a Wimpy Kid
author: Jeff Kinney
summary: The story follows Greg Heffley, a middle-school student trying to navigate adolescence and survive seventh grade.

title: Harry Potter
author: J.K. Rowling
summary: The series follows Harry Potter, an orphan boy who discovers he is a wizard and attends Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

title: The Lord of the Rings
author: J.R.R. Tolkien
summary: A hobbit named Frodo Baggins inherits the One Ring and embarks on a perilous journey to destroy it in the fires of Mount Doom.
